msg.msgText: A call to getBytes() or readBytes() on a Message object failed because the value is not of type byte array (byte[]) and cannot be successfully converted to a byte array.

msgExplanation.p: The getBytes() and readBytes() methods can read only byte arrays (byte[]) or values that can be converted to byte array.

msgUserResponse.p: Attempt to get or read the content as type Object.
